name: Bernie Ecclestone
introduction: OccupationChairman EmeritusEmployerFormula One GroupYears active20172020OccupationCEOEmployerFOM, Formula One Administration, Formula One GroupYears active19742017OccupationTeam Owner/ManagerEmployerBrabhamYears active19711987Bernard Charles "Bernie" Ecclestone (born 28 October 1930 in Bungay, Suffolk, England, United Kingdom) is a British businessman who served as Chief Executive Officer of Formula One Management and Formula One Administration for over 40 years.  He currently holds the position of Chairman Emeritus following the takeover of Formula One by Liberty Media.
